MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject CreateMediaConfiguration(class Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.IAudioSocket audioSocket) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a serialized MediaConfiguration object representing the socket so that the Skype calling cloud can establish an audio/video call to the bot.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject CreateMediaConfiguration(class Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.IVideoSocket vbssSocket) cil managed

Docs.param: Video socket for the video-based screen sharing (VBSS) modality. Socket must be configured as RecvOnly.
Docs.summary: Returns a serialized mediaConfiguration object representing the socket so that the Skype calling cloud can establish a video-based screen sharing call to the bot.

MemberSignature.Value: public Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject CreateMediaConfiguration (Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.IAudioSocket audioSocket, Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.IVideoSocket videoSocket);

Docs.summary: Returns a serialized MediaConfiguration object representing the sockets so that the Skype calling cloud can establish an audio/video call to the bot.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject CreateMediaConfiguration(class Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.IAudioSocket audioSocket, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.IVideoSocket> videoSockets) cil managed

Docs.param: Ordered list of video sockets. If multiview sockets are provided, only the first one can have a send direction (ie. send only or send receive) and all the sockets should have a receive direction.
Docs.summary: Returns a serialized MediaConfiguration object representing the sockets so that the Skype calling cloud can establish an audio/video call to the bot.

MemberSignature.Value: public Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject CreateMediaConfiguration (Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.IAudioSocket audioSocket, System.Collections.Generic.IList<Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.IVideoSocket> videoSockets, Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.IVideoSocket vbssSocket);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject CreateMediaConfiguration(class Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.IAudioSocket audioSocket, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.IVideoSocket> videoSockets, class Microsoft.Skype.Bots.Media.IVideoSocket vbssSocket) cil managed

Docs.param: Ordered list of video sockets. If multiview sockets are provided, only the first one can have a send direction (ie. send only or send receive) and all the sockets should have a receive direction.
Video socket for the video-based screen sharing (VBSS) modality. Socket must be configured as RecvOnly.
Docs.summary: Returns a serialized MediaConfiguration object representing the sockets so that the Skype calling cloud can establish an audio/video/video-based screen sharing call to the bot.
